StaticAnalogCbSynapse Class Reference

#include <staticanalogcbsynapse.h>

Inheritance diagram for StaticAnalogCbSynapse:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Its input is the synaptic conductance and its output is the PSC.

Public Member Functions

  • void reset (void)
    Reset to initial condition.
  • int advance (void)
    Advance the state of the Synapse.
  • virtual int addOutgoing (Advancable *a)
    Outgoing objects must be CbNeurons.

Public Attributes

  • double E
    Equilibrium potential given by the Nernst equation.

Private Attributes

  • double * GSummationPoint
    Pointer to postsynaptic conductance summation point within the synaptic target ( Neuron, SynapticChannel, Compartment...).
